description: Allows the mob to pick up items on the ground.
title: behavior.pickup_items

can_pickup_any_item.description: If true, the mob can pickup any item
can_pickup_any_item.title: can_pickup_any_item

can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.description: If true, the mob can pickup items to its hand or armor slots
can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.title: can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: goal_radius

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob will look for items to pick up
max_dist.title: max_dist

pickup_based_on_chance.description: If true, depending on the difficulty, there is a random chance that the mob may not be able to pickup items
pickup_based_on_chance.title: pickup_based_on_chance

track_target.description: If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
track_target.title: track_target
